name: 布莱恩·法赫蒂
name_full: 布莱恩·法赫蒂 Brian Faherty
introduction: Brian is a graduate of Marquette University, where he played Club Lacrosse and was a member of the Sigma Chi Fraternity. He is the middle of three brothers. His older brother, Mick Faherty, is a Writer/Producer for Warm Springs Productions in Missoula, Montana. His younger brother, Kevin, is a High School Administrator and Coach in Boston.
